subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description: Identification and prioritization of relief and recovery needs of the country. Through advocacy, create awareness of humanitarian situation and needs of the country among donors and non governmental organizations. Mobilize resources for relief anf recovery interventions and report to donors.
subproject.title: RELIEF AND RECOVERY UNIT
